name: Retention
summary: This game is about a person who kept running through his life, never looking back at the past. He rarely slept, and even with 24 hours in a day, it was not enough for him. Once during a trip, he gets into trouble. Now he's lying on the cold ground, buried beneath his bicycle. Slides of various moments fly
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 其他
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2015年1月13日
